entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:22 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:22 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:22 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
